・iOS 11 adaption

・Some bugs and crash problems have been fixed
- bug fixed.
- bug fixed.

- Personal recommendation gives all you want based on your listening experience.
- Top Chart displays the top 100 podcasts in each region.
- There is a new tab on the channel page, where we list a series of podcasts similar to what you are browsing.

- Label the episode recently played in each podcast.
- Label your latest listening in each episode.
- Push notifications for latest news and selected podcast.
- Redesign the interface of podcast page, simple and fun.

- Notifications of subscription update. You can now receive them if you log in.
- Changing Profile photo. You now can update your profile photo simply by tapping on the account page.

Himalaya 2.0 is coming soon, along with entirely new design and intelligent recommendation platform.

Himalaya Learning is live!
You can now listen to bite-sized audio courses from world-class thinkers like Tim Ferriss, Seth Godin and Chris Voss to fuel your personal and professional growth.
Get started with 7-day free trial.
